title: `ve` Conversion Drills
goal: Practice `ve` conversion and learn new vocabulary.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Conversion review:

se: x1 ↔ x2
te: x1 ↔ x3
ve: x1 ↔ x4

Convert: mi vecnu la cukta do pa no no → ? (with ve)

(Answer: pa no no ve vecnu la cukta do mi)

New Material (5-7 min)

More ve Practice

la skami ve benji la notci la .alis. mi — The computer is the medium for sending a message to Alice by me.

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
sazri x1 operates x2 for purpose x3 operate/drive
zbasu x1 makes x2 from materials x3 make/build

ve with benji

Original benji:

benji — x1 sends x2 to x3 from x4 via x5

With ve: x1 = source location

Normal With ve
mi benji la notci do la zdani la zdani ve benji la notci do mi
I send a message to you from home. Home is the source of the message to you by me.

ve with Four-Place Gismu

Any gismu with a meaningful x4 can use ve:

mrilu (mail): x1 is mail sent by x2 to x3 with contents x4

Normal With ve
ti mrilu mi do la notci la notci ve mrilu mi do ti
This is mail from me to you with a message. The message is the content of mail from me to you.

When ve is Less Common

Some gismu have rarely-used fourth places. For these, ve is uncommon:

  • tavla (x4 = language) — ve tavla = "the language in which..."
  • Most three-place gismu don't have x4

Focus on gismu where x4 matters: vecnu, benji, mrilu.

Key Point

ve is most useful for gismu with meaningful fourth places — prices, sources, contents.

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Apply ve

Rewrite using ve:

  1. mi vecnu la skami la .bob. re no no → ?
  2. la .alis. cu benji la cukta mi la dinju → ?
  3. do vecnu la karce la .tam. mu no no no → ?
Answers
  1. re no no ve vecnu la skami la .bob. mi
  2. la dinju ve benji la cukta mi la .alis.
  3. mu no no no ve vecnu la karce la .tam. do

Exercise 2: Translate with ve

Translate to Lojban, using ve to focus on price:

  1. 100 is the price of the computer to Alice from me.
  2. 500 is the price of the car to you from Bob.
  3. 25 is the price of the book to me from you.
Answers
  1. pa no no ve vecnu la skami la .alis. mi
  2. mu no no ve vecnu la karce do la .bob.
  3. re mu ve vecnu la cukta mi do

Exercise 3: Use New Vocabulary

Translate using sazri or zbasu:

  1. I operate the computer.
  2. Bob makes a table from wood.
  3. You drive the car.
Answers
  1. mi sazri la skami
  2. la .bob. cu zbasu la jubme (materials unspecified or add wood word)
  3. do sazri la karce

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Say aloud:

  1. "I sell a computer for 200." → mi vecnu la skami zo'e re no no
  2. "200 is the price." → re no no ve vecnu la skami
  3. "I operate the car." → mi sazri la karce
  4. "Bob makes a book." → la .bob. cu zbasu la cukta

Today's Vocab

Lojban Place Structure English
sazri x1 operates x2 for purpose x3 operate
zbasu x1 makes x2 from materials x3 make

x1 makes x2 from materials x3

sections.content:
Summary

You drilled ve conversion, focusing on gismu where x4 is meaningful (prices, sources). You learned sazri (operate) and zbasu (make).

Tomorrow preview: You'll learn xe, the final conversion operator, which swaps x1 and x5.
